Keyword module¶

class Keyword.Keyword(nWord='', nType=0, nSal=0, nFreq=0, nKeyscore=0)[source]¶

Bases: object

Summary: Stores a specific keyword and it’s associated information. The constructor accepts the word, type, salience, frequency and keyscore of a specific keyword.

classmethod issimilar(passedWord)[source]¶

Summary: Determines if the passed keyword is similar to (or exactly the same as) the main word in the class.

Parameters:passedWord (str) – word
Returns:boolean value of True or False
Return type:bool
similarwordfrequency()[source]¶

Summary: Returns the frequency of a similar word in a document.

Returns:frequency value
Return type:int
wordfrequency()[source]¶

Summary: returns keyword frequency.

Returns:frequency value
Return type:int
